attributes.action: CALL AN ELECTION NOW! LET THE PEOPLE DECIDE
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK are fed up of the failings of this coalition Government and demand that David Cameron calls a general election now.You are failing the poorest and most vulnerable in our country , expecting us to put up with cuts , while you only freeze your own wages and give other countries hand outs to bail them out. How can you expect Britain to get back to work , when you put every obstacle in their way to do so? You even pandered to Energy companies instead of positive action for poorer households.
